data.name: The Island King's Order Demo
data.detailed_description:
Choose a hero, Build your base, Gather resources and fight the coming monsters.
Play as the hero or as the commander.
data.about_the_game:
Choose a hero, Build your base, Gather resources and fight the coming monsters.
Play as the hero or as the commander.
